original: @367a / /rgya gar skad du /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

analyzed: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /

original: bam po dang po /
analyzed: bam po dang po /
translated: Part One

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas!

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard at one time:

original: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lanta ka'i gnas na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lanta ka'i gnas na /
translated: The Blessed One was dwelling in Rājagṛha, in the Kalandaka­nivāpa,

original: dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag sum cu thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa /
analyzed: dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag sum cu thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa /

original: spobs pa thogs pa med pa /
analyzed: spobs pa thogs pa med pa /
translated: unobstructed eloquence,

original: ting nge 'dzin thob pa /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thob pa /
translated: attained samādhi,

original: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa /
translated: dwelt in the samādhi of emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul ba /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul ba /
translated: had the sphere of activity of signlessness,

original: smon lam bcos ma ma yin pa /
analyzed: smon lam bcos ma ma yin pa /
translated: they were not artificial in their aspirations;

original: smon pa med pa la gnas pa /
analyzed: smon pa med pa la gnas pa /
translated: they were established in the absence of aspirations;

original: spyod lam bcos pa med pa /
analyzed: spyod lam bcos pa med pa /
translated: they were not artificial in their conduct;

original: sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa /🔽mnyam pa nyid du bzod pa thob pa /
analyzed: sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa / mnyam pa nyid du bzod pa thob pa /
translated: they had attained the dhāraṇī of accomplishing infinite doors;🔽they had attained the acceptance of sameness;

original: mnyam pa nyid thob pa /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid thob pa /
translated: they had attained sameness;

original: thogs pa med pa'i gzungs thob pa /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa'i gzungs thob pa /
translated: they had attained the unobstructed dhāraṇī;

original: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / bsam pa dang / @367b spyod pa'i tshul shin tu shes pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / bsam pa dang / @367b spyod pa'i tshul shin tu shes pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
translated: and they knew the faculties of all beings, whether they were supreme or not, and they knew their thoughts and conduct.

original: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gzugs med pa /
analyzed: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gzugs med pa /
translated: At that time the Blessed One was in the absorption of the blessing of the thus-gone ones, the absorption that engages the domain of all buddhas, which is formless,

original: bstan du med pa /🔽gzung ba med pa /
analyzed: bstan du med pa / gzung ba med pa /
translated: cannot be shown,🔽cannot be grasped,

original: thogs pa med pa /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa /
translated: is unobstructed,

original: snang ba med pa /🔽rnam par rig pa med pa /
analyzed: snang ba med pa / rnam par rig pa med pa /
translated: is not a manifestation,🔽is not a cognition,

original: rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin pa /
analyzed: rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin pa /
translated: and is not something to be cognized.

original: sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral pa /🔽rtsa ba med pa /
analyzed: sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral pa / rtsa ba med pa /
translated: It is free from mind, mentality, and consciousness.🔽It is without root.

original: rten pa med pa /
analyzed: rten pa med pa /
translated: It is without support.

original: dmigs su med pa /🔽mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa med pa /
analyzed: dmigs su med pa / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa med pa /
translated: It is without reference point.🔽It is not equal and not unequal.

original: zla med pa /🔽nga yi ba med pa /
analyzed: zla med pa / nga yi ba med pa /
translated: It is without a companion.🔽It is without an “I” and “mine.”

original: yongs su 'dzin pa med pa /🔽mi bya ba /
analyzed: yongs su 'dzin pa med pa / mi bya ba /
translated: It is without grasping.🔽It is not an action.

original: ma byas pa /🔽ma song ba /🔽ma 'ongs pa /
analyzed: ma byas pa / ma song ba / ma 'ongs pa /
translated: It is not done.🔽It does not go.🔽It does not come.

original: 'gro ba med pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba med pa /
translated: It does not move.

original: mi gnas pa /
analyzed: mi gnas pa /
translated: It does not remain.

original: rgyun chad pa med pa /
analyzed: rgyun chad pa med pa /
translated: It is not interrupted.

original: gnas med pa /
analyzed: gnas med pa /
translated: It is without a location.

original: mtshan ma med pa /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa /
translated: It is without signs.

original: mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba /🔽blang ba med pa /
analyzed: mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba / blang ba med pa /
translated: It is free from all signs.🔽It is not taken up.

original: dor ba med pa /🔽'dus ma byas pa /🔽mngon par 'du mi byed pa /
analyzed: dor ba med pa / 'dus ma byas pa / mngon par 'du mi byed pa /
translated: It is not put down.🔽It is unconditioned.🔽It is not a formation.

original: 'du ba med pa /
analyzed: 'du ba med pa /
translated: It is not a gathering.

original: bral ba med pa /
analyzed: bral ba med pa /
translated: It is not a separation.

original: sems med pa /
analyzed: sems med pa /
translated: It is without mind.

original: sems dang bral ba /🔽kun tu 'byung ba med pa /🔽rtsom pa med pa /
analyzed: sems dang bral ba / kun tu 'byung ba med pa / rtsom pa med pa /
translated: It is free from mind.🔽It is not a source.🔽It is not a beginning.

original: yong su grub pa med pa /🔽ma byung ba /
analyzed: yong su grub pa med pa / ma byung ba /
translated: It is not an establishment.🔽It is not arisen.

original: kun tu ma byung ba /🔽rab tu rgyu ba med pa /
analyzed: kun tu ma byung ba / rab tu rgyu ba med pa /
translated: It is not fully arisen.🔽It does not move.

original: yang dag par rgyu ba med pa /
analyzed: yang dag par rgyu ba med pa /
translated: It does not move correctly.

original: shin tu stong pa /
analyzed: shin tu stong pa /
translated: It is utterly empty.

original: 'dre ba med pa /
analyzed: 'dre ba med pa /
translated: It is not mixed.

original: chos thams cad la sgro btags pa med pa /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad la sgro btags pa med pa / 'di lta ste /
translated: He was free of all superimpositions.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He entered the samādhi called the dhāraṇī gateway that is the domain of all buddhas, the seal of the thus-gone ones’ wisdom.

original: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'ang mi snang /🔽sku'i mtshan @368a *//
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'ang mi snang / sku'i mtshan @368a *//
translated: As soon as he entered that samādhi, the Blessed One’s body was no longer visible.

original: ma'ang mi snang /
analyzed: ma'ang mi snang /
translated: His physical characteristics were no longer visible.

original: sems dang / sems kyi mtshan ma'ang mi snang /🔽na bza' dang / na bza'i mtshan ma'ang mi snang /
analyzed: sems dang / sems kyi mtshan ma'ang mi snang / na bza' dang / na bza'i mtshan ma'ang mi snang /
translated: His mind and the characteristics of his mind were no longer visible.🔽His robes and the characteristics of his robes were no longer visible.

original: gdan dang / gdan gyi mtshan ma'ang mi snang /🔽gzims pa dang / gzims pa'i mtshan ma'ang mi snang /
analyzed: gdan dang / gdan gyi mtshan ma'ang mi snang / gzims pa dang / gzims pa'i mtshan ma'ang mi snang /
translated: His seat and the characteristics of his seat were no longer visible.🔽His lying down and the characteristics of his lying down were no longer visible.

original: 'chag pa dang / 'chag pa'i mtshan ma'ang mi snang /🔽bzhengs pa dang / bzhengs pa'i mtshan ma'ang mi snang /
analyzed: 'chag pa dang / 'chag pa'i mtshan ma'ang mi snang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhengs pa'i mtshan ma'ang mi snang /
translated: His walking and the characteristics of his walking were no longer visible.🔽His standing and the characteristics of his standing were no longer visible.

original: gnas pa dang / gnas pa'i mtshan ma'ang mi snang /
analyzed: gnas pa dang / gnas pa'i mtshan ma'ang mi snang /
translated: His sitting and the characteristics of his sitting were no longer visible.

original: grib ma'i dbyibs dang / grib ma'i dbyibs kyi mtshan ma'ang mi snang /
analyzed: grib ma'i dbyibs dang / grib ma'i dbyibs kyi mtshan ma'ang mi snang /
translated: the shape of the shadow, and the sign of the shape of the shadow did not appear.

original: bzhugs pa dang / bzhugs pa'i mtshan ma'ang mi snang zhing /
analyzed: bzhugs pa dang / bzhugs pa'i mtshan ma'ang mi snang zhing /
translated: His sitting, and the sign of his sitting, did not appear.

original: sgra dang / sgra'i mtshan ma'ang mi grag go /
analyzed: sgra dang / sgra'i mtshan ma'ang mi grag go /
translated: His voice, and the sign of his voice, were not heard.

original: de nas ting nge 'dzin de'i mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas /
analyzed: de nas ting nge 'dzin de'i mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas /
translated: Then, through the power of that samādhi and the blessing of the Buddha, this world realm of a billion worlds was filled with a great light.

original: 'di lta bu'i 'od kyis snang bar byas te /
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i 'od kyis snang bar byas te /
translated: It was illuminated by that light.

original: 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na zla ba'i 'od kyang mi snang /
analyzed: 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na zla ba'i 'od kyang mi snang /
translated: In that light, the light of the moon did not appear,

original: nyi ma dang / skar ma dang / me dang / nor bu dang / glog gi 'od rnams kyang mi snang; dri za rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / 'dod pa na spyad pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / skar ma rnams dang /
analyzed: nyi ma dang / skar ma dang / me dang / nor bu dang / glog gi 'od rnams kyang mi snang; dri za rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / 'dod pa na spyad pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / skar ma rnams dang /
translated: nor did the light of the sun, the stars, fire, jewels, or lightning appear. The gandharvas, kinnaras, those who enjoy desire, the devas who enjoy the pleasures of the five senses, the stars,

original: lha'i gzhal med khang gi 'od kyang mi snang /
analyzed: lha'i gzhal med khang gi 'od kyang mi snang /
translated: The light of the celestial palaces of the gods did not shine.

original: brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi 'od kyang mi snang ngo //
analyzed: brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi 'od kyang mi snang ngo //
translated: The light of Śakra, Brahmā, and the Lokapālas did not shine.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus gang lha kha cig kyang lha'i dri mi tshor te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus gang lha kha cig kyang lha'i dri mi tshor te /
translated: By the power of the Buddha’s blessing and that samādhi, some gods did not smell the divine fragrances.

original: stong @368b gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad lha'i dri las shin tu 'das pa'i dris dri rab tu zhim par byas so //
analyzed: stong @368b gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad lha'i dri las shin tu 'das pa'i dris dri rab tu zhim par byas so //
translated: The entire trichiliocosm was filled with a fragrance that surpassed the fragrance of the gods.

original: 'jig rten gyi bar thams cad kyang snang bar gyur khor yug gi ri dang / khor yug gi ri chen po'ang snang bar byas /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi bar thams cad kyang snang bar gyur khor yug gi ri dang / khor yug gi ri chen po'ang snang bar byas /
translated: All the spaces between the worlds became illuminated, and the Cakravāḍa and Mahācakravāḍa mountains became illuminated.

original: ri rab dang / de ma yin pa ri'i rgyal po gzhan dag dang / ri nag po dag kyang snang bar gyur te /
analyzed: ri rab dang / de ma yin pa ri'i rgyal po gzhan dag dang / ri nag po dag kyang snang bar gyur te /
translated: Mount Sumeru, the other kings of mountains, and the black mountains became illuminated.

original: phyis ni sems can gang gi mig gi dbang po la'ang snang bar ma gyur to //
analyzed: phyis ni sems can gang gi mig gi dbang po la'ang snang bar ma gyur to //
translated: Later, it did not shine in the eyes of any sentient beings.

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang rin po che'i dra bas kun tu bskor bar gyur to //
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang rin po che'i dra bas kun tu bskor bar gyur to //
translated: The entire trichiliocosm was surrounded by a net of jewels.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad du'ang dar gyi lda ldi bres shing pog snod nas spos kyis bdugs la me tog sna tshogs bkram par gyur to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad du'ang dar gyi lda ldi bres shing pog snod nas spos kyis bdugs la me tog sna tshogs bkram par gyur to //
translated: In all the buddha realms of this Sahā world system, silk streamers were hung, incense burners perfumed the air with incense, and various flowers were scattered.

original: sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lanta ka'i gnas kyang bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri dang bcas te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lanta ka'i gnas kyang bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri dang bcas te /
translated: By the Buddha’s power, the Kalandaka­nivāpa in the Veṇuvana, together with the Vulture Peak,

original: de dag thams cad lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur cing /
analyzed: de dag thams cad lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur cing /
translated: became as level as the palm of a hand.

original: shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi padma chen po 'dab ma brgya stong yod pa /
analyzed: shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi padma chen po 'dab ma brgya stong yod pa /
translated: It was filled with great lotuses the size of chariot wheels, with hundreds of thousands of petals,

original: dri rab tu zhim zhing yid du 'ong bas kun gang bar gyur to //
analyzed: dri rab tu zhim zhing yid du 'ong bas kun gang bar gyur to //
translated: with a fragrance that was delightful and pleasing.

original: steng gi bar snang las kyang rin po che'i dra ba'i gdugs kyis g-yogs shing brgyan to //
analyzed: steng gi bar snang las kyang rin po che'i dra ba'i gdugs kyis g-yogs shing brgyan to //
translated: Above, the sky was covered with a jeweled net canopy.

original: yul ma ga dh'a thams cad kyang gos ka tsa lindi ka ltar reg na bde bar gyur to //🔽de nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub @369a *//
analyzed: yul ma ga dh'a thams cad kyang gos ka tsa lindi ka ltar reg na bde bar gyur to // de nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub @369a *//
translated: The entire land of Magadha became soft and pleasant to the touch, like the skin of a young girl.

original: tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa /
analyzed: tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa /
translated: Then, in the east, in buddha realms as numerous as the grains of sand in the Ganges river, bodhisattva great beings who were only one birth away from unexcelled, perfect enlightenment,

original: tshad med pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa /
translated: incalculable,

original: grangs med / dpag tu med pa brgya stong rnams kyang so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bskul te /
analyzed: grangs med / dpag tu med pa brgya stong rnams kyang so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bskul te /
translated: innumerable, and immeasurable hundreds of thousands, were urged by their own buddha bhagavats:

original: rigs kyi bu dag /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dag /
translated: Sons of noble family!

original: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du dengs shig /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du dengs shig /
translated: Go to the Sahā world system.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te /
translated: There, the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha Śākyamuni resides,🔽lives, and is manifest,

original: 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de /
analyzed: 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de /
translated: teaching the Dharma.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He entered the samādhi called the dhāraṇī gateway that enters the domain of all buddhas, the tathāgata’s wisdom seal.

original: rigs kyi bu dag /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dag /
translated: “Noble sons,

original: ting nge 'dzin de thos pa tsam gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gces spras byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de thos pa tsam gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gces spras byed par 'gyur te /
translated: merely hearing that samādhi will be cherished by bodhisattvas,

original: thabs mkhas pa med par bskal pa brgya stong du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa ni de lta ma yin gyi /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa med par bskal pa brgya stong du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa ni de lta ma yin gyi /
translated: but not by those who have practiced the six perfections for a hundred thousand eons without skillful means.

original: ting nge 'dzin de nyan du dengs shig /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de nyan du dengs shig /
translated: Go and listen to that samādhi.”

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ltar mnyan nas /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ltar mnyan nas /
translated: Then those bodhisattva mahāsattvas, having listened to their respective tathāgatas,

original: bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag btsal te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag btsal te /
translated: bowed to those bhagavats🔽and

original: skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nas mi snang bar gyur nas rang rang gi mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ga la ba dang / dbus kyi gling bzhi pa ga la ba dang /
analyzed: skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nas mi snang bar gyur nas rang rang gi mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ga la ba dang / dbus kyi gling bzhi pa ga la ba dang /

translated: It is not without essence, not weak, and not cut.

original: ma bcad ma byung kun tu ma byung zhig pa'ang med //
analyzed: ma bcad ma byung kun tu ma byung zhig pa'ang med //
translated: It is not uncut, not arisen, not arisen everywhere, and not destroyed.

original: thob pa med cing rdul tsam dag kyang bshig med de //
analyzed: thob pa med cing rdul tsam dag kyang bshig med de //
translated: It is not attained, and not even an atom is destroyed.

original: rdul med rnams kyi sku de de 'drar shes par bya //
analyzed: rdul med rnams kyi sku de de 'drar shes par bya //
translated: The body of those without dust should be understood to be like this.

original: ma mthong ma thos ma bsnams reg par gyur pa med //
analyzed: ma mthong ma thos ma bsnams reg par gyur pa med //
translated: It is not seen, not heard, not smelled, and not touched.

original: rnam par rig med ma brtags mig yor 'dra ba ste //
analyzed: rnam par rig med ma brtags mig yor 'dra ba ste //
translated: It is not cognized, not examined, and is like a mirage.

original: srog chags mthong nas rang gi 'dzin pas sems kyang rangs //
analyzed: srog chags mthong nas rang gi 'dzin pas sems kyang rangs //
translated: When seen by living beings, it is also self-pacified by its own grasping.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas dag gi sku 'grub bstan pa'o //🔽phung po ma yin khams min mi rdzun mi bden te //
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas dag gi sku 'grub bstan pa'o // phung po ma yin khams min mi rdzun mi bden te //
translated: This is the teaching on the accomplishment of the body of the Buddhas.🔽It is not the aggregates, not the elements, not false, and not true.

original: dag med rnam par dag med dbang pos mi reg pa //
analyzed: dag med rnam par dag med dbang pos mi reg pa //
translated: It is not pure, not completely pure, and is not touched by the faculties.

original: rtog pa med cing rnam par mi rtog chu zla 'dra //
analyzed: rtog pa med cing rnam par mi rtog chu zla 'dra //
translated: Without thought, without discrimination, like the moon in water.

original: bde bar gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bar su 'dod pa //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bar su 'dod pa //
translated: Those who wish to see the Sugata’s body

original: sku ni rgyu dang rkyen las gyur te rang bzhin med //
analyzed: sku ni rgyu dang rkyen las gyur te rang bzhin med //
translated: Should see the body as arisen from causes and conditions, without intrinsic nature,

original: ma skyes ma 'gags song ba med cing 'phos pa'ang med //
analyzed: ma skyes ma 'gags song ba med cing 'phos pa'ang med //
translated: Not arisen, not ceased, not gone, not transferred.

original: brtags na 'jig rten gsum ni sgyu ma bzhin du snang //
analyzed: brtags na 'jig rten gsum ni sgyu ma bzhin du snang //
translated: When examined, the three worlds appear like an illusion.

original: rgyal ba rnams kyi sku ni mi rtog de 'drar ltos //
analyzed: rgyal ba rnams kyi sku ni mi rtog de 'drar ltos //
translated: The Victorious Ones’ bodies are nonconceptual; see them in this way.

original: zhi med rab zhi ma yin zhi bral sbyor ba'ang med //
analyzed: zhi med rab zhi ma yin zhi bral sbyor ba'ang med //
translated: Not peaceful, not thoroughly peaceful, not free from peace, not applied,

original: chags med rigs med 'di na chad pa stong pa bzhin //
analyzed: chags med rigs med 'di na chad pa stong pa bzhin //
translated: Not attached, not a class, not cut off, like the four emptinesses.

original: yang na ngo bo nyid kyis nam mkha' lta bu ste //
analyzed: yang na ngo bo nyid kyis nam mkha' lta bu ste //
translated: Or, by its very essence, like space.

original: de ltar mthong na nyin mtshan @376b sangs rgyas mchod pa yin //
analyzed: de ltar mthong na nyin mtshan @376b sangs rgyas mchod pa yin //
translated: If seen in this way, day and night are offerings to the Buddha.

original: zhing rnams bye ba stong phrag ji tsam phyogs rnams su //
analyzed: zhing rnams bye ba stong phrag ji tsam phyogs rnams su //
translated: As many as are the ten directions and the ten million fields,

original: srid pa'i rtse mo bar du rin chen gang ba dag /
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo bar du rin chen gang ba dag /
translated: Up to the peak of existence, filled with jewels

original: sangs rgyas rnams la bskal mang phye ba'i mthar 'bul ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams la bskal mang phye ba'i mthar 'bul ba //
translated: And offered to the Buddhas for many eons.

original: sbyin pa de ni mdo sde 'di bris char mi phod //
analyzed: sbyin pa de ni mdo sde 'di bris char mi phod //
translated: That generosity does not equal a portion of this sūtra.

original: gangg'a'i bye ma snyed pas mang ba'i bskal par yang //
analyzed: gangg'a'i bye ma snyed pas mang ba'i bskal par yang //
translated: Even for eons as numerous as the sands of the Ganges,

original: 'gro la snyoms pa'i sems kyis byams pa bsgoms pa bas //
analyzed: 'gro la snyoms pa'i sems kyis byams pa bsgoms pa bas //
translated: Meditating on love with a mind of impartiality for beings

original: gang zhig ye shes phyag rgya ting 'dzin mchog mos pa //
analyzed: gang zhig ye shes phyag rgya ting 'dzin mchog mos pa //
translated: Is not equal to a portion of the supreme samādhi of the wisdom seal.

original: tshul khrims de ni bzod pa 'di yi char mi phod //
analyzed: tshul khrims de ni bzod pa 'di yi char mi phod //
translated: That morality does not equal a portion of this patience.

original: ji tsam sngon gyi 'khor ba dag ni mtha' yas pa //
analyzed: ji tsam sngon gyi 'khor ba dag ni mtha' yas pa //
translated: For as long as the endless saṃsāra of the past,

original: de srid bskal par srog chags kun la rtag bzod pa //
analyzed: de srid bskal par srog chags kun la rtag bzod pa //
translated: For that long, always patient with all beings in the eons,

original: rgyal ba'i phyag rgya 'di la dad pa gcig bskyed na //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i phyag rgya 'di la dad pa gcig bskyed na //
translated: Is not equal to a portion of the faith in this Victor’s seal.

original: 'dir dad bsod nams dang ni ri rab yungs 'bru bzhin //
analyzed: 'dir dad bsod nams dang ni ri rab yungs 'bru bzhin //
translated: Here, faith and merit are like Mount Meru and a mustard seed.

original: ji tsam 'jig rten gsum gyi sems can rnam mang skyes //
analyzed: ji tsam 'jig rten gsum gyi sems can rnam mang skyes //
translated: For as many of the many beings born in the three worlds,

original: de dag mi gang bskal pa mang por mgor thogs shing //
analyzed: de dag mi gang bskal pa mang por mgor thogs shing //
translated: If a person were to carry them on their head for many eons,

original: lus kyang mi ngal nam du'ang g-yo ba mi skyed pa //
analyzed: lus kyang mi ngal nam du'ang g-yo ba mi skyed pa //
translated: And their body never tired, never moved,

original: brtson 'grus de ni bzod pa 'di yi char mi phyod //
analyzed: brtson 'grus de ni bzod pa 'di yi char mi phyod //
translated: That effort does not equal a portion of this patience.

original: zhing brgya'i bye ma ji snyed de bas lhag pa yi //🔽bskal pa mang por gang rnams bsam gtan byed pas //🔽mdo sde 'di la nyin zhag gcig tsam spyod pa yang //
analyzed: zhing brgya'i bye ma ji snyed de bas lhag pa yi // bskal pa mang por gang rnams bsam gtan byed pas // mdo sde 'di la nyin zhag gcig tsam spyod pa yang //
translated: More numerous than the grains of sand in a hundred world-systems,🔽The merit from that would not equal even a fraction

original: bsod nams de ni bzod pa 'di yi dper mi rung //
analyzed: bsod nams de ni bzod pa 'di yi dper mi rung //
translated: Of the merit from practicing this sūtra for a single day.

original: rdul khams ji snyed pa yi bskal pa grangs med par //
analyzed: rdul khams ji snyed pa yi bskal pa grangs med par //
translated: “For eons as numerous as the atoms in the element of earth,

original: shes rab mtha' gnyis spangs la mngon par brtson pa bas //🔽gang gis ji skad bshad pa'i ye shes 'di rtogs pa //
analyzed: shes rab mtha' gnyis spangs la mngon par brtson pa bas // gang gis ji skad bshad pa'i ye shes 'di rtogs pa //
translated: They would strive in wisdom, free from the two extremes.

original: bsod nams de yang rgya @377a *//
analyzed: bsod nams de yang rgya @377a *//
translated: But the merit from realizing the wisdom as it is taught

original: mtsho dang ni chu thigs bzhin //
analyzed: mtsho dang ni chu thigs bzhin //
translated: Would be like the ocean compared to a puddle.

original: rgyal ba la ni gzugs dang mtshan mar ma lta shig /
analyzed: rgyal ba la ni gzugs dang mtshan mar ma lta shig /
translated: “Do not look at the Victorious One in terms of form or characteristics.

original: byis pa lta bus bde bar gshegs la sems ma ltar //
analyzed: byis pa lta bus bde bar gshegs la sems ma ltar //
translated: Do not look at the Sugata with the eyes of a child.

original: gang gis rab 'byor lta bur nga ni mthong gyur pa //
analyzed: gang gis rab 'byor lta bur nga ni mthong gyur pa //
translated: Whoever sees me as Subhūti

original: des ni stong gsum kun gyi sbyon pa thams cad sbyangs //
analyzed: des ni stong gsum kun gyi sbyon pa thams cad sbyangs //
translated: Has purified all the offerings in the trichiliocosm.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs nas /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs nas /
translated: Then the Blessed One spoke these verses:

original: yang gnas brtan sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: yang gnas brtan sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: He also said to the elder Śāradvatīputra:

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: this absorption of the wisdom seal of the tathāgatas is the perfection of the unobstructed wisdom vision of all bodhisattvas in the world systems of the ten directions.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: gang zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'dod na lhag pa'i bsam pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'dod na lhag pa'i bsam pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: if someone wishes to see the blessed buddhas, they should apply themselves to this absorption with a higher intention.

original: byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyor ba ni nyin zhag gcig kho nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyor ba ni nyin zhag gcig kho nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: A bodhisattva who applies themselves with a higher intention will see the tathāgatas in just one day.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'dod pa des ting nge 'dzin 'di la nyin mtshan du sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'dod pa des ting nge 'dzin 'di la nyin mtshan du sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: Moreover, Śāradvatīputra, if a bodhisattva wishes to see the blessed buddhas in all the buddhafields of the ten directions, they should apply themselves day and night to this absorption.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pas 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phyogs bcu'i sangs @377b rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pas 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phyogs bcu'i sangs @377b rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The bodhisattvas who engage with superior intention will see the blessed buddhas in all the buddhafields of the ten directions.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo mtha' yas bsgrub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi tshul sgrub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo mtha' yas bsgrub pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi tshul sgrub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: this absorption of the thus-gone one’s wisdom seal is the accomplishment of the dhāraṇī gateway that establishes the bodhisattvas’ infinite gateways.

original: 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi gnas so //
analyzed: 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi gnas so //
translated: It is the basis of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: 'di las gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'di las gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'byung ngo //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways emerge from it.

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This samādhi will accomplish the thirty-two marks of a great being for bodhisattvas and will perfect the eighty minor marks.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la rab tu sbyor ba ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag pa thob bo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la rab tu sbyor ba ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag pa thob bo //
translated: “Those who apply themselves to this bodhisattva samādhi will attain the purification of all karmic obscurations.

original: bdud kyi las thams cad las kyang yang dag par 'da'o //
analyzed: bdud kyi las thams cad las kyang yang dag par 'da'o //
translated: They will also transcend all the works of Māra.

original: 'gro ba dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'gro ba dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byed pa ma yin /
translated: They will not serve the tathāgatas with their retinues,

original: spyod pa ma yin /
analyzed: spyod pa ma yin /
translated: nor will they serve them without their retinues.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyor ba ni gang ci smra ba de dag thams cad 'khrul ba med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyor ba ni gang ci smra ba de dag thams cad 'khrul ba med do //
translated: Those who apply themselves to this bodhisattva samādhi will not make any mistakes in whatever they say.

original: de'i lus kyi las gang ci yin pa de thams cad kyang skyon med do //
analyzed: de'i lus kyi las gang ci yin pa de thams cad kyang skyon med do //
translated: Whatever physical actions they have will all be faultless.

original: ngag gi las gang ci yin pa de dag thams cad kyang kun tu 'byung ba med do //
analyzed: ngag gi las gang ci yin pa de dag thams cad kyang kun tu 'byung ba med do //
translated: All his verbal actions are free from arising.

original: yid kyi las gang ci yin pa de dag thams cad kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi las gang ci yin pa de dag thams cad kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa med do //
translated: All his mental actions are free from afflictions.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ldem po dag khong du chud par 'dod pas ting @378a *//
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ldem po dag khong du chud par 'dod pas ting @378a *//
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: de 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //🔽chos bstan pa khong du chud par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o // chos bstan pa khong du chud par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: bodhisattvas who wish to understand the intentions of the thus-gone ones should apply themselves to this absorption.🔽Those who wish to understand the teachings of the Dharma should apply themselves to this absorption.

original: chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba ston par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //🔽bden pa'i tshul khong du chud par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi mtshams sbyar ba ston par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o // bden pa'i tshul khong du chud par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Those who wish to teach the connections of the Dharma should apply themselves to this absorption.🔽Those who wish to understand the way of truth should apply themselves to this absorption.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bya bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bya bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Those who wish to actualize the limit of reality should apply themselves to this absorption.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'gyur ba khong du chud par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'gyur ba khong du chud par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should apply oneself to this samādhi in order to understand dependent origination.

original: sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should apply oneself to this samādhi in order to know the inclinations of sentient beings as they are.

original: bsam pa ji ltar ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su gzung bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: bsam pa ji ltar ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su gzung bar 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should apply oneself to this samādhi in order to attain the perfect array of the qualities of a buddhafield according to one’s aspirations.

original: 'od phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'od phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should apply oneself to this samādhi in order to accomplish perfect light.

original: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should apply oneself to this samādhi in order to perfect the assembly.

original: tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshe phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should apply oneself to this samādhi in order to perfect the excellence of lifespan.

original: bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Those who wish to perfect the excellent array should apply themselves to this samādhi.

original: bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Those who wish to perfect the excellent teaching should apply themselves to this samādhi.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @378b bdag dang / gzhan gyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @378b bdag dang / gzhan gyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Bodhisattva mahāsattvas who wish to fulfill all the wishes of themselves and others should apply themselves to this samādhi.

original: yongs su 'tshol ba dang / mos pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bsgom pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su 'tshol ba dang / mos pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bsgom pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: They should apply themselves to this samādhi in order to investigate, have conviction, write it down, read it, hold it, keep it, and meditate on it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?🔽Because none of that will be difficult for them.

original: de dag thams cad de la dka' bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: de dag thams cad de la dka' bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: dper na / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'am /
translated: For example, there is a great precious wish-fulfilling jewel called “granting all wishes,”

original: 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa'i shing gis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa'i shing gis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: or a tree called “granting all wishes” that fulfills the wishes of all sentient beings.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: in the same way, this absorption fulfills all the wishes of bodhisattva great beings in every way.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: bsam pa ji bzhin dga' bde'i rtsa ba ste //

analyzed: ting 'dzin phyag rgya 'di ni bde gshegs nor; ;rin chen ldan pa'i yul 'khor rgyal pos bsten //

analyzed: rin chen dam pa rin chen mchog 'byung gnas //

original: zhi zhing zhi la yid ni zhi byed pa //
analyzed: zhi zhing zhi la yid ni zhi byed pa //

original: mdzes pa byed dang bdag tu lta ba sbyong //
analyzed: mdzes pa byed dang bdag tu lta ba sbyong //

analyzed: sangs rgyas gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di rnyed pas //

analyzed: dpa' bo'i mtshon gyis bdud ni rab tu 'joms //

original: shes bya'i srog chags ye shes shes byed pa //
analyzed: shes bya'i srog chags ye shes shes byed pa //

analyzed: ye shes 'byung gnas ye shes 'byor shes rab //

original: ye shes snang ba pha rol mtha' yas te //
analyzed: ye shes snang ba pha rol mtha' yas te //

analyzed: mdo sde 'di ni ye shes sgo 'byung gnas //

original: dul ba dul ba mdud pa gnyis gcod pa //

analyzed: lta byas drug cu gnyis kyi lta ba sbyong //

original: rgyal ba'i sgo ste bdud rtsi 'thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sgo ste bdud rtsi 'thob par 'gyur //

analyzed: 'di ni sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'byung gnas //

analyzed: byang chub shin tu byang chub rang bzhin mthun //

analyzed: mu stegs shes byed byang chub rgyu shes byed //

original: byang chub 'di ni gnyid log sad byed pa //
analyzed: byang chub 'di ni gnyid log sad byed pa //

analyzed: byang @379b chub tshul 'dir mtha' yas zad mi shes //

original: chos kyi tshul dang rigs pa rnam par sgom //
analyzed: chos kyi tshul dang rigs pa rnam par sgom //
translated: And the way of the Dharma and the principles are contemplated.

original: mtha' yas pa yi gzungs rnams rab tu sgrub //
analyzed: mtha' yas pa yi gzungs rnams rab tu sgrub //

original: stobs bcu rnams kyi chos la 'jug pa ste //
analyzed: stobs bcu rnams kyi chos la 'jug pa ste //

original: gzungs 'di nyid ni rgya mtsho lta bu'o //
analyzed: gzungs 'di nyid ni rgya mtsho lta bu'o //

original: 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa sgrub //
analyzed: 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa sgrub //

original: 'di ni tshul khrims pha rol phyin dang bzod //
analyzed: 'di ni tshul khrims pha rol phyin dang bzod //
translated: This is the perfection of discipline, patience,

original: brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab mi zad de //
analyzed: brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab mi zad de //
translated: Diligence, concentration, and inexhaustible wisdom.

original: 'dir gnas pha rol phyin pa phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: 'dir gnas pha rol phyin pa phun sum tshogs //

original: las dang nyon mongs pa la 'jigs ma byed //
analyzed: las dang nyon mongs pa la 'jigs ma byed //

original: blo gros ngan pa'i bdud kyis ma 'jigs shig /
analyzed: blo gros ngan pa'i bdud kyis ma 'jigs shig /

original: 'di la sbyor la rab tu mchod med de //
analyzed: 'di la sbyor la rab tu mchod med de //

original: ji ltar bsam bzhin byang chub sde 'tshang rgya //
analyzed: ji ltar bsam bzhin byang chub sde 'tshang rgya //

original: mdo sde 'di ni yongs su gzung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: mdo sde 'di ni yongs su gzung ba'i phyir //

analyzed: phyogs bcu gang lhags byang chub mi byed snod //

original: sras rnams dag ni bskal pa bzang 'di la //
analyzed: sras rnams dag ni bskal pa bzang 'di la //

original: 'dug pa de dag dpang du gyur pa yin //
analyzed: 'dug pa de dag dpang du gyur pa yin //

analyzed: 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum //

original: mdo sde 'di ni ma byon rnams kyi yum //
analyzed: mdo sde 'di ni ma byon rnams kyi yum //

original: da ltar byung ba thams cad 'di las byung //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba thams cad 'di las byung //
translated: All those of the present have come from it.

original: de phyir rgyal ba'i spun rnams 'dir sbyor cig /
analyzed: de phyir rgyal ba'i spun rnams 'dir sbyor cig /
translated: Therefore, O sons of the victors, apply yourselves here.

original: gang dag mdo 'di tshul la rab gnas pa //
analyzed: gang dag mdo 'di tshul la rab gnas pa //
translated: Those who abide in the way of this sūtra

original: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nor 'thob cing //
analyzed: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nor 'thob cing //
translated: Will obtain the wealth of the tathāgatas,

original: las kyang rnam dag spyod pa rdzogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: las kyang rnam dag spyod pa rdzogs par 'gyur //
translated: Their actions will be purified, and their conduct will be perfected.

original: mi ldog sa 'thob 'dam las brgal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mi ldog sa 'thob 'dam las brgal bar 'gyur //
translated: They will attain the irreversible stage and cross over the swamp.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na /🔽byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig gangg'a'i klung sum cu'i bye ma snyed kyis ting nge @380a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na / byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig gangg'a'i klung sum cu'i bye ma snyed kyis ting nge @380a *//
translated: When the Bhagavān had explained this Dharma discourse,

original: 'dzin 'di thob bo //
analyzed: 'dzin 'di thob bo //
translated: trillions of bodhisattvas as numerous as the grains of sand in thirty Ganges Rivers attained this samādhi.

original: byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad ni bskal pa brgya stong nas bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag nas; bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad ni bskal pa brgya stong nas bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag nas; bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te //
translated: Eighty-six trillion bodhisattvas purified the karmic obscurations they had accumulated over a hundred thousand eons and became irreversible from unsurpassed and perfect awakening.

original: de dag thams cad kyis skad cig mi zad pa bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo //
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyis skad cig mi zad pa bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo //
translated: All of them attained the dhāraṇī called the accomplishment of the instant.

original: lha dang mi'i skye dgu dkrigs pa phrag drug cu po gang dag sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed nas /
analyzed: lha dang mi'i skye dgu dkrigs pa phrag drug cu po gang dag sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed nas /
translated: The six hundred thousand quintillion devas and humans who had not previously given rise to the mind set on unsurpassed and perfect awakening all gave rise to the mind set on unsurpassed and perfect awakening.

original: thams cad ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ngo //
analyzed: thams cad ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ngo //
translated: All of them rejoiced in this samādhi.

original: de dag ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur nas //
analyzed: de dag ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur nas //
translated: By the roots of virtue connected with their rejoicing in this absorption, they will not turn back from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa 'bum phrag sum cu na 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //🔽zhes lung bstan to //
analyzed: de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa 'bum phrag sum cu na 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro // zhes lung bstan to //
translated: The Blessed One prophesied that all of them will become thus-gone ones, worthy ones, perfect buddhas named Abhaya in thirty hundred thousand eons.

original: de dag las kha cig yun ring po nas smon lam btab pa dang ldan pa dag ni bzod pa thob bo //
analyzed: de dag las kha cig yun ring po nas smon lam btab pa dang ldan pa dag ni bzod pa thob bo //
translated: Some of them, endowed with prayers of aspiration made long ago, attained acceptance.

original: kha cig smon lam myur du 'debs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon @380b par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste /
analyzed: kha cig smon lam myur du 'debs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon @380b par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste /
translated: Some of them, who made prayers of aspiration quickly, will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening in various buddhafields.

original: thams cad kyang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: thams cad kyang 'di lta ste /
translated: All of them will be named Abhaya.

original: 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya bar ming mthun par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya bar ming mthun par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will all have the same name: Abhaya.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas /
translated: Then the Blessed One, looking at the entire assembly,

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
translated: said to Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta:

original: 'jam dpal / de lta bas na khyod mi dmigs pa'i tshul du gnas shing spros pa med pa la dga' bas mi gnas par spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jam dpal / de lta bas na khyod mi dmigs pa'i tshul du gnas shing spros pa med pa la dga' bas mi gnas par spyad par bya'o //
translated: “Mañjuśrī, therefore, you should abide in a way that is free from apprehending and delight in the absence of conceptual elaboration, practicing without abiding.

original: chos thams cad la mi gnas par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsgrubs pa 'di kun tu bsrung bar bya'o //

translated: You should protect this unsurpassed, perfect awakening, which is accomplished over a hundred thousand quintillion asaṃkhyeya eons with respect to all phenomena without abiding.

original: gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o //
translated: You should uphold it, keep it, and teach it extensively to others.

original: spros pa med pa la dga' bar bya'o //
analyzed: spros pa med pa la dga' bar bya'o //
translated: You should delight in the absence of conceptual elaboration.

original: gnas med par spyod pa dang / chos thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / phrag dog med par bya'o //
analyzed: gnas med par spyod pa dang / chos thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / phrag dog med par bya'o //
translated: One should practice without a basis, without abiding in any phenomenon, and without envy.

original: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te /🔽gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
analyzed: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te / gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
translated: Then Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta rose from his seat,🔽put his upper robe over one shoulder, and knelt on his right knee.

original: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
translated: Bowing to the Blessed One with palms joined,

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: he said this to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di kun tu bsrung zhing rab tu bsrung @381a *//
analyzed: chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di kun tu bsrung zhing rab tu bsrung @381a *//
translated: I am inspired to fully protect and guard this unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening because all phenomena are ungraspable.

original: bar spro'o // bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bar spro'o // bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

analyzed: byang chub gang lags pa de ni gang gi'ang ma lags / gang nas kyang ma lags /

original: gang na'ang ma lags /🔽gang gis kyang ma lags /
analyzed: gang na'ang ma lags / gang gis kyang ma lags /
translated: It is nowhere.🔽It is not anything.

original: ci'ang ma lags te /🔽mi snang ba /
analyzed: ci'ang ma lags te / mi snang ba /
translated: It is nothing.🔽It is not visible.

original: gzung du ma mchis pa /
analyzed: gzung du ma mchis pa /
translated: It is ungraspable.

original: thob pa ma lags pa /
analyzed: thob pa ma lags pa /
translated: not lost,

original: chud zos pa ma lags pa'o //
analyzed: chud zos pa ma lags pa'o //
translated: not wasted.

original: de nas 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag sum cu stan las langs nas /
analyzed: de nas 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag sum cu stan las langs nas /
translated: Then, from that assembly, three hundred million bodhisattvas rose from their seats,

original: thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: put their palms together, and said to the Bhagavān,

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa /
translated: “Bhagavān,

original: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsgrubs pa 'di bsrung ba dang / gzung ba dang / bstan pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par spro'o zhes gsol nas /

translated: we too are eager to protect, uphold, teach, and explain this unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment of the tathāgatas, which has been accomplished over incalculable, hundred thousand, million, billion eons, and to teach it in full to others.”

original: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi gos bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par gsol te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi gos bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par gsol te /
translated: Then all those bodhisattvas offered their own robes to the Bhagavān

original: smon lam yang btab bo //
analyzed: smon lam yang btab bo //
translated: and made aspirations.

analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to the bodhisattva mahāsattva Maitreya:

analyzed: byams pa / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i bsam pas soms shig /

original: 'di khyod kyi las yin no //
analyzed: 'di khyod kyi las yin no //
translated: This is your task.

analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs @381b nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te / pus mo g-yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs nas /
translated: Then the bodhisattva mahāsattva Maitreya rose from his seat, draped his upper robe over one shoulder,🔽and knelt on his right knee.

original: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
translated: Bowing to the Blessed One with palms joined,

analyzed: byams pa / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag sum cu po 'di dag ni nang na brgyad stong ni dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa /

analyzed: dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par gnas par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' lhag ma ni dmu rgod dmigs par 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa /

analyzed: dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa ma yin par 'gyur te /

analyzed: de dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma'i tshe /

analyzed: 'gal bar byed par 'gyur /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: byams pa / rnam pa bdun gyis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed do //

original: bdun gang zhe na /
analyzed: bdun gang zhe na /

translated: The Blessed Buddhas generate the mind of enlightenment in bodhisattvas,🔽and bodhisattvas generate the mind of enlightenment in order to protect the sublime teaching at a time when the sublime teaching is disintegrating, and bodhisattvas generate the mind of enlightenment out of great compassion that arises from seeing the realm of sentient beings who are oppressed by various sufferings,

original: byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / bsti stang du byas te sbyin pa bzang po yid du 'ong ba byin nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / bsti stang du byas te sbyin pa bzang po yid du 'ong ba byin nas /

original: byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / gzhan yang /

translated: Bodhisattvas generate the mind of enlightenment after hearing the praises of the perfect qualities of the various ornaments of the marks and signs of the body of the Tathāgata.

original: byams pa / rnam pa bdun po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
analyzed: byams pa / rnam pa bdun po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed do //

original: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa /
translated: and those who, seeing the realm of sentient beings oppressed by various sufferings, arouse great compassion for all sentient beings and arouse the mind of awakening—

original: sems bskyed pa 'di gsum ni /
analyzed: sems bskyed pa 'di gsum ni /
translated: Maitreya, these three kinds of arousing the mind of awakening

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bsrung ba yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bsrung ba yin te /
translated: are the protection of the awakening of the blessed buddhas.

original: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: byams pa; sems bskyed pa de dag las lhag ma bzhi ni /

analyzed: byams pa / byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga dang ldan na phyir mi ldog pa'i chos su rig par bya'o //

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

analyzed: sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yin /

original: pha rol gyi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la phrag dog med pa yin; srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa mi smra ba yin /

analyzed: shes kyi khe dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la mi chags pa yin /

analyzed: de dag gis bskal pa grangs med par gang sdig pa'i las mngon par 'dus byas par gyur pa de dag gi de'ang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na klad pa na ba tsam gyis thams cad byang bar 'gyur / sems nyam nga ba tsam gyis thams cad byang bar 'gyur /

analyzed: skur pa btab pa tsam gyis thams cad byang bar 'gyur /

analyzed: tha na rmi lam na sdig pa mthong ba rmis pas kyang las kyi sgrib pa de byang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if they see evil in dreams, they will purify their karmic obscurations.

original: las kyi sgrib pa des nyen par @393b gyur na ni bdud sdig can gyi zil gyis non par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las kyi sgrib pa des nyen par @393b gyur na ni bdud sdig can gyi zil gyis non par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who are afflicted by karmic obscurations will be overcome by the evil Māra.

original: de dag bdud sdig can gyis zil gyis non par gyur na ni bdud kyi skyon rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag bdud sdig can gyis zil gyis non par gyur na ni bdud kyi skyon rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who are overcome by the evil Māra will not realize the faults of Māra.

original: de dag bdud kyi skyon khong du ma chud pas de la gang dag rnyed pa dang ldan pa de dag ni ma rnyed pa dag la brnyas so //
analyzed: de dag bdud kyi skyon khong du ma chud pas de la gang dag rnyed pa dang ldan pa de dag ni ma rnyed pa dag la brnyas so //
translated: Those who do not realize the faults of Māra will despise those who are not wealthy.

original: gang dag mdzes par gyur pa de dag ni mdzes pa ma yin pa dag la brnyas so //🔽gang dag blta na sdug par gyur pa de dag ni blta na mi sdug pa dag la brnyas so //
analyzed: gang dag mdzes par gyur pa de dag ni mdzes pa ma yin pa dag la brnyas so // gang dag blta na sdug par gyur pa de dag ni blta na mi sdug pa dag la brnyas so //
translated: Those who are beautiful will despise those who are not beautiful.🔽Those who are pleasant to look at will despise those who are not pleasant to look at.

original: gang dag mthong na dga' bar gyur pa de dag ni mthong na dga' ba ma yin pa dag la brnyas so //
analyzed: gang dag mthong na dga' bar gyur pa de dag ni mthong na dga' ba ma yin pa dag la brnyas so //
translated: Those who are delightful to see will despise those who are not delightful to see.

original: gang dag mang du thos par gyur pa de dag ni mang du thos pa ma yin pa dag la brnyas so //
analyzed: gang dag mang du thos par gyur pa de dag ni mang du thos pa ma yin pa dag la brnyas so //
translated: Those who have heard much despise those who have not heard much.

original: gang dag spobs pa dang ldan par gyur pa de dag ni spobs pa dang mi ldan pa dag la brnyas so //
analyzed: gang dag spobs pa dang ldan par gyur pa de dag ni spobs pa dang mi ldan pa dag la brnyas so //
translated: Those who are eloquent despise those who are not eloquent.

original: gang dag gtong pa la mos par gyur pa de dag ni ser sna can dag la brnyas so //
analyzed: gang dag gtong pa la mos par gyur pa de dag ni ser sna can dag la brnyas so //
translated: Those who are devoted to generosity despise the stingy.

original: gang dag tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur pa de dag ni dang tshul ngan pa can dag la brnyas so //🔽gang dag bzod pa tsam rnyad par gyur pa de dag ni gnod sems can dag la brnyas so //
analyzed: gang dag tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur pa de dag ni dang tshul ngan pa can dag la brnyas so // gang dag bzod pa tsam rnyad par gyur pa de dag ni gnod sems can dag la brnyas so //
translated: Those who are moral despise the immoral.🔽Those who have attained mere patience despise the malicious.

original: gang dag brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur pa de dag ni le lo can dag la brnyas so //
analyzed: gang dag brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur pa de dag ni le lo can dag la brnyas so //
translated: Those who are energetic despise the lazy.

original: gang dag bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed par gyur pa de dag ni sems rnam par g-yengs pa dag la brnyas so //
analyzed: gang dag bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed par gyur pa de dag ni sems rnam par g-yengs pa dag la brnyas so //
translated: Those who are devoted to concentration despise the distracted.

original: gang dag shes rab dang ldan par gyur pa de dag ni 'chal ba'i shes rab can @394a *//🔽dag la brnyas so //
analyzed: gang dag shes rab dang ldan par gyur pa de dag ni 'chal ba'i shes rab can @394a *// dag la brnyas so //
translated: Those who are endowed with wisdom will despise those who are of poor wisdom.

original: gang dag thabs la mkhas par gyur pa de dag ni thabs la mi mkhas pa dag la brnyas so //
analyzed: gang dag thabs la mkhas par gyur pa de dag ni thabs la mi mkhas pa dag la brnyas so //
translated: Those who are skilled in means will despise those who are not skilled in means.

original: de dag chos yid du 'ong ba gang dang gang rnyed par gyur pa de'ang de dag nyid kyis gzhan la brnyas so //🔽byams pa / gang dag mthun par gyur nas lan gcig ste /
analyzed: de dag chos yid du 'ong ba gang dang gang rnyed par gyur pa de'ang de dag nyid kyis gzhan la brnyas so // byams pa / gang dag mthun par gyur nas lan gcig ste /
translated: Whatever pleasant Dharma they obtain, they will despise others with it.

original: dbyer med pas sngon sangs rgyas brgya la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa de dag kyang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dbye bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: dbyer med pas sngon sangs rgyas brgya la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa de dag kyang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dbye bar 'gyur na /
translated: Maitreya, those who have become harmonious and have planted roots of virtue with one hundred buddhas, even they will be divided in the future, in the later times.

original: de las gzhan pa'i sems can bsam pa ma nges pa /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i sems can bsam pa ma nges pa /
translated: What need is there to mention other beings whose intentions are uncertain,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa /
translated: who have not planted roots of virtue,

original: blo rgod pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos /
analyzed: blo rgod pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos /
translated: and whose minds are wild?

original: byams pa / de ltar phyis 'jig rten mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byams pa / de ltar phyis 'jig rten mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Maitreya, in this way, in the future, the world will become unbearable.

original: byams pa / de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' khyod kyis go cha chen po sra ba shin tu bgo bar bya /
analyzed: byams pa / de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' khyod kyis go cha chen po sra ba shin tu bgo bar bya /
translated: Maitreya, therefore, you should don the great armor of steadfastness.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrub pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan par bya /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrub pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan par bya /
translated: You should accomplish it with superior intention and be endowed with the power of patience.

original: chos zab mo la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas par bya /
analyzed: chos zab mo la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas par bya /
translated: You should be skilled in the wisdom that engages with the profound Dharma.

original: dmigs pa med pa'i lta ba can du 'gyur bar bya /
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i lta ba can du 'gyur bar bya /
translated: You should have a view that is free from reference points.

original: sems brtan par bya /🔽brtson 'grus brtan par bya /
analyzed: sems brtan par bya / brtson 'grus brtan par bya /
translated: You should stabilize your mind.🔽You should stabilize your diligence.

original: rtul ba brtan pa dang / sbyor ba brtan par bya /
analyzed: rtul ba brtan pa dang / sbyor ba brtan par bya /
translated: You should stabilize your courage and your application.

original: phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos yongs su blang ba dang / dam pa'i chos gzung ba dang / dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrung ba dang / dam pa'i chos ring du gnas par bya ba la spro bar bya /🔽brtson 'grus brtsam @394b par bya /
analyzed: phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos yongs su blang ba dang / dam pa'i chos gzung ba dang / dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrung ba dang / dam pa'i chos ring du gnas par bya ba la spro bar bya / brtson 'grus brtsam @394b par bya /
translated: In future times, you should delight in upholding the sublime Dharma, in upholding the sublime Dharma, in protecting the sublime Dharma, and in making the sublime Dharma last.🔽You should make an effort.

original: brtson par bya /
analyzed: brtson par bya /
translated: You should strive.

original: gzhan yang gzud par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang gzud par bya'o //
translated: You should also lead others.

original: de nas mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med pa drug cu dang / byams pa dang / seng ge rab snang la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa 'di thos nas /
analyzed: de nas mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med pa drug cu dang / byams pa dang / seng ge rab snang la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa 'di thos nas /
translated: Then the king of supreme joy, Mañjuśrī, and so forth, the sixty incomparable bodhisattvas, Maitreya, Haripuṃgavikiraṇa, and so forth, the bodhisattva mahāsattvas of the fortunate eon, having heard this teaching by the Blessed One on upholding the sublime Dharma,

original: phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus de na dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar spro bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus de na dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar spro bar 'gyur te /
translated: were inspired to uphold the sublime Dharma in the future, in later times.

original: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: They said this to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: bdag cag lhan cig tu mthun par g-yo dang / sgyu thams cad spangs shing /
analyzed: bdag cag lhan cig tu mthun par g-yo dang / sgyu thams cad spangs shing /
translated: we will all together, in harmony, abandon all deceit and fraud,

original: nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa thams cad spangs la dga' ba dang / mi dga' ba dang / srid pa thams cad bsal te /
analyzed: nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa thams cad spangs la dga' ba dang / mi dga' ba dang / srid pa thams cad bsal te /
translated: and abandon all pride, conceit, and arrogance, and dispel all joy, displeasure, and existence.

original: zab mo mi dmigs pa la mos shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsgrubs pa 'di kun tu bsrung bar bgyi /🔽gzung bar bgyi /
analyzed: zab mo mi dmigs pa la mos shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsgrubs pa 'di kun tu bsrung bar bgyi / gzung bar bgyi /
translated: We will protect this enlightenment of the Tathāgata, which is accomplished over a hundred thousand quintillion asaṃkhyeya eons, and which is profound and not perceived by others.🔽We will uphold it.

original: yongs su gzung bar bgyi /
analyzed: yongs su gzung bar bgyi /
translated: We will fully uphold it.

original: gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi zhing /
analyzed: gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi zhing /
translated: We will teach it widely to others.

original: bdag cag lus dang srog la mi blta bar sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdag cag lus dang srog la mi blta bar sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o //
translated: We will protect this enlightenment of the Buddha without regard for our bodies and lives.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal la @395a *//
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal la @395a *//
translated: Then the Bhagavān, in order to instruct the king Pramuditarāja, Mañjuśrī,

original: sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med pa drug cu dang / byams pa dang / seng ger bsnang la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la rjes su bstan pa'i phyir chigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
analyzed: sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med pa drug cu dang / byams pa dang / seng ger bsnang la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la rjes su bstan pa'i phyir chigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
translated: and the sixty incomparable bodhisattvas beginning with Mañjuśrī, and the bodhisattva mahāsattvas of the fortunate eon beginning with Maitreya and Siṃhapradyota, spoke these verses:

original: g-yo med sgyu med nga med tha ba med //
analyzed: g-yo med sgyu med nga med tha ba med //
translated: Without deceit, without pretense, without pride, without harshness,

original: dran ldan blo gros ldan zhing gnas med gnas //
analyzed: dran ldan blo gros ldan zhing gnas med gnas //
translated: Mindful, intelligent, without a home, with a home,

original: zab mo bzod la mi g-yeng legs gnas te //
analyzed: zab mo bzod la mi g-yeng legs gnas te //
translated: Patient with the profound, without distraction, well-established,

original: rigs kyi bu dag /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dag /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
